```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(include = FALSE,
                      echo = FALSE,
                      fig.width = 8)
rmarkdown::render("../../_scripts/analysis_functions.Rmd")
library(gt)
```


```{r}
fathers <- freqs |> 
    filter(month == 6,
           nth_sunday == 3,
           ward != "Anonymous",
           country %in% c("United States", "Unknown")) |> 
    print()
```

```{r}
fathers |> 
    filter(!hymn_num %in% 169:196) |> 
    cleveland_plot(filter_n = 5)
```

```{r}
single_hymn_lookup(92)
```
